aboutMeDialog.business: At Dulce Toxo, you will find a wide variety of handmade desserts and sweets such as:

cupcakes.title: Cupcakes
cupcakes.description: Little works of art in cake form. Fluffy, colorful, and topped with delicious frostings that make them irresistible. A bite of happiness!

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Little delights that are crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. From classic chocolate chip to the most innovative ones, perfect for any sweet moment!

cheesecakes.title: Cheesecakes
cheesecakes.description: Smooth, creamy, and full of flavor. From the classic New York style to the most surprising variations, every bite is pure temptation.

spongeCakes.title: Sponge Cakes
spongeCakes.description: Fluffy and homemade, perfect to enjoy with coffee or tea. Traditional or with a special twist, they're always a hit.

brownies.title: Brownies
brownies.description: Deliciously dense and moist, with a perfect balance between crunchy and soft. Ideal for chocolate lovers.

coldCakes.title: Cold Cakes
coldCakes.description: Refreshing and creamy, perfect for any occasion. With irresistible combinations of flavors and textures that will make you fall in love.

recipe.difficultyTooltip: Click to see the explanation of each difficulty level

1.title: Easy
1.description: Simple recipes that use basic ingredients, require little time (less than 30 minutes) and don't need specialized equipment. Ideal for absolute beginners.

2.title: Medium
2.description: Involves basic cooking or mixing steps, with common ingredients and moderate time (30-60 minutes). Requires minimal attention, but some experience in cooking.

3.title: Hard
3.description: Requires specific techniques like beating whites or assembling layers, with multiple steps and extended time (1-2 hours). Requires precision to avoid common errors.

4.title: Very hard
4.description: Involves complex processes like rolling dough or delicate emulsions, with specialized ingredients and high risk of failure. Time: 2-4 hours, more cooled.

5.title: Extremely hard
5.description: Professional recipes with multiple components (creams, glazes, decorations), precise millimeter precision and advanced equipment. Time: more than 4 hours, often in stages.
